semantics.annotation: italic-R POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-g POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-N CLOSE:) RELOP:similar-to italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-nu POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ATOM:and caligraphic-Z OPEN:( italic-N CLOSE:) RELOP:similar-to italic-z POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
R_{g}(N)\sim N^{\nu}\mbox{ and }{\cal Z}(N)\sim z^{N}N^{% \gamma-1}\,.

caligraphic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-f POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-N CLOSE:) RELOP:similar-to italic-z POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-N POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-f POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
{\cal Z}_{f}(N)\sim z^{N}N^{\gamma_{f}-1}.

\gamma_{f}\sim-f^{3/2}.
